Booking.formDescription1: Planning a group event and need 10 or more rooms? Fill out the form below! Once we’ve received your request, our group booking team will be in touch.
Booking.formDescription2: Fill out the form below! Once we’ve received your request, our group booking team will be in touch.
Booking.title: Group Booking Enquiry
Booking.highlight: Great value stays for large groups.
Booking.description: Tell us more about your travel needs.
Booking.error_emailaddress: Please enter a valid email address.
Booking.is_your_group_staying_for_Business_Leisu: Is your group staying for Business or Leisure
Booking.Please_tick_this_box_booking_school_grou: Please tick this box if you are booking for a school or youth group.
Booking.reason_group_visit: What is the reason for your group's visit?
Booking.out_team_accommudate: Our team will try to accommodate your group’s preferences in terms of hotels and dates. If that’s not possible, we’ll do everything we can to offer the best alternatives.
Booking.type_occupancy: Select the maximum number of rooms required by room type and occupancy.
Booking.let_us_know: Let us know if you have any additional information or special requests.
Booking.each_night: If you do not require the same number of rooms on each night of your stay, please state below the number and type of rooms required each night.
